title: Engineered pluronic nanomicelles containing ATRA and sodium butyrate for selective TNBC differentiation therapy.
abstract: We formulated a micellar nanosystem for selective differentiation therapy of breast cancer stem cells (BCSCs). Hyaluronic acid (HA) coating was used to target CD44
